name: Tortle Rescue
description:
This is my submission for the #tortle-jam

Its a clicker game all about different kinds of turtles. By clicking on the screen you get coins which you can invest to buy a base turtle. Turtles grand you more coins per second. When you have 2 Turtles of the same kind you can merge them and increase your coins per click.

This game is not balanced and lacks gameplay. But I am okay with how it turned out. My first time using Unity and trying to finish a project.
